name: Wampa (V)
Lore: 'Sly, carnivorous beast which stalks the snow-packed tundra. Wampas frequently drag their prey to an ice cave for storage. They always prefer to devour their victims alive.',
Text: '* Ferocity = 3 + destiny. Habitat: Hoth sites. Deploys only to marker sites. Characters defeated by this Wampa may be relocated to Wampa Cave instead of being eaten (opponent of victim chooses).',
